description: Announcement http://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2004/10/04/introducing-the-alexa-web-information-service/ doesn't state beta, and earliest product page accessible https://web.archive.org/web/20060223102040/http://www.amazon.com/gp/browse.html?node=12782661 also doesn't state beta (GA). Since no contradictory information, assume GA on release.

http://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2008/08/20/amazon-elastic-block-store-now-available/
https://web.archive.org/web/20081004222031/http://aws.amazon.com/ebs/ shows no beta, so assume ga at this time

http://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2008/11/18/whats-new-cloudfront/
https://web.archive.org/web/20081201070709/http://aws.amazon.com/cloudfront/ (2008-12-01) lists it as beta, 2010-11-09 announced as ga, so this is beta.

Announcement clearly states management-console is in beta (http://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2009/01/08/announcing-the-aws-management-console/) but there is no announcement of it going GA. 2009-07-07 is already GA (https://web.archive.org/web/20090707115644/http://aws.amazon.com/console).

No separate announcement, is in beta 2009-09-07 (https://web.archive.org/web/20090907172843/http://aws.amazon.com/autoscaling/)  and GA 2009-10-22 (https://web.archive.org/web/20091022191748/http://aws.amazon.com/autoscaling/).

No known announcements. 2009-10-08 is in beta (https://web.archive.org/web/20091008130229/http://aws.amazon.com/elasticmapreduce/) and 2009-12-08 is GA (https://web.archive.org/web/20091208104334/http://aws.amazon.com/elasticmapreduce/)

http://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2011/01/25/introducing-amazon-simple-email-service-beta/
Note that although SES has multiple endpoints (see http://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/rande.html#ses_region) it is not region-bound in the same sense as instance-based services, thus it is listed as non-region-bound service here.

http://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2012/08/20/announcing-amazon-glacier/
https://web.archive.org/web/20120824133701/http://aws.amazon.com/glacier/? has no beta marked (from 2012-08-24) so assuming GA.
No known announcement of GA, service announced as beta 2012-12-20 but already on 2012-12-30 shows no beta (https://web.archive.org/web/20121230183006/http://aws.amazon.com/datapipeline)

http://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2013/03/26/announcing-aws-cloudhsm/
https://web.archive.org/web/20130401055055/http://aws.amazon.com/cloudhsm/  (2013-04-01) has no mention of beta, so assuming GA from start.

No known announcement. 2013-10-24 is beta (https://web.archive.org/web/20131024024350/https://aws.amazon.com/dynamodb/)  and on 2013-10-31 is GA (https://web.archive.org/web/20131031051123/http://aws.amazon.com/dynamodb/)

No known announcement. 2012-12-06 is in beta (https://web.archive.org/web/20131206041030/https://aws.amazon.com/swf/) and on 2012-12-13 in GA (https://web.archive.org/web/20131213062247/http://aws.amazon.com/swf/)
